event.description: David Eckstein singles on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Brian Giles flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Scott Hairston doubles (7) on a sharp ground ball to shortstop Miguel Tejada, deflected by third baseman Geoff Blum. David Eckstein to 3rd.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, third baseman Geoff Blum to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Chase Headley flies out sharply to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Kevin Kouzmanoff flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Nick Hundley singles on a ground ball to shortstop Miguel Tejada.
Luis Antonio Rodriguez doubles (4) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee. Nick Hundley to 3rd.
Chad Gaudin strikes out on a foul tip.
David Eckstein grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Brian Giles called out on strikes.
Scott Hairston flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Chase Headley strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kouzmanoff strikes out swinging.
Nick Hundley grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Luis Antonio Rodriguez pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Chad Gaudin strikes out swinging.
David Eckstein pops out to third baseman Geoff Blum in foul territory.
Brian Giles pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Scott Hairston strikes out on a foul tip.
Adrian Gonzalez flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Chase Headley strikes out swinging.
Kevin Kouzmanoff flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Nick Hundley singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Luis Antonio Rodriguez grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Edgar Gonzalez replaces Chad Gaudin.
Edgar Gonzalez flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
David Eckstein flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Brian Giles flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Pitching Change: LaTroy Hawkins replaces Wandy Rodriguez, batting 4th, replacing left fielder Carlos Lee.
Defensive Substitution: Jason Michaels replaces pitcher Wandy Rodriguez, batting 9th, playing left field.
Scott Hairston called out on strikes.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, first baseman Darin Erstad to pitcher LaTroy Hawkins.
Chase Headley grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Darin Erstad.
Kazuo Matsui grounds out, second baseman David Eckstein to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Michael Bourn grounds out, second baseman David Eckstein to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Hunter Pence singles on a ground ball to pitcher Chad Gaudin. Hunter Pence advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by pitcher Chad Gaudin.
Carlos Lee grounds out, third baseman Kevin Kouzmanoff to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Miguel Tejada grounds out, pitcher Chad Gaudin to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Geoff Blum walks.
Darin Erstad strikes out swinging and Geoff Blum caught stealing 2nd, catcher Nick Hundley to shortstop Luis Antonio Rodriguez.
Ivan Rodriguez strikes out swinging.
Wandy Rodriguez turns around to bat right-handed.
Wandy Rodriguez grounds out, second baseman David Eckstein to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Kazuo Matsui singles on a fly ball to center fielder Scott Hairston.
Michael Bourn walks. Kazuo Matsui to 2nd.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Carlos Lee doubles (8) on a line drive to right fielder Brian Giles.
Miguel Tejada flies out to left fielder Chase Headley.
Geoff Blum flies out to center fielder Scott Hairston.
Darin Erstad grounds out, pitcher Chad Gaudin to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Ivan Rodriguez hit by pitch.
Wandy Rodriguez turns around to bat right-handed.
Wandy Rodriguez bunt pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Kazuo Matsui walks. Ivan Rodriguez to 2nd.
Michael Bourn grounds out, first baseman Adrian Gonzalez to pitcher Chad Gaudin. Ivan Rodriguez to 3rd. Kazuo Matsui to 2nd.
Hunter Pence singles on a ground ball to right fielder Brian Giles, deflected by first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Ivan Rodriguez scores. Kazuo Matsui scores.
Carlos Lee singles on a fly ball to right fielder Brian Giles. Hunter Pence to 3rd.
Miguel Tejada flies out to left fielder Chase Headley.
Geoff Blum strikes out swinging.
Darin Erstad grounds out, pitcher Chad Gaudin to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Ivan Rodriguez grounds out, catcher Nick Hundley to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Wandy Rodriguez turns around to bat right-handed.
Wandy Rodriguez lines out to shortstop Luis Antonio Rodriguez.
Kazuo Matsui flies out to left fielder Chase Headley.
Michael Bourn strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Cla Meredith replaces Chad Gaudin, batting 9th, replacing Edgar Gonzalez.
Hunter Pence pops out to second baseman David Eckstein.
Carlos Lee grounds out, third baseman Kevin Kouzmanoff to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Miguel Tejada strikes out swinging.
